description: This file defines a custom Flutter widget named OceanButton, which is a minimal, rounded button aligned with the Ocean theme. It supports optional icon inclusion alongside the label text.

classes.name: OceanButton
classes.description: A custom Flutter widget that creates a minimal, rounded button with optional icon and label.

methods.name: OceanButton
methods.description: Constructor for OceanButton, allowing to specify label text, callback, and optional icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the OceanButton, arranging icon and label inside an ElevatedButton.
